Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the rights of parties involved in foreclosure actions
Summary: Relates to the rights of parties involved in foreclosure actions; provides additional details regarding the commencement and termination of certain actions related to real property.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd ยง1301, RPAP L; amd R3217, ยง205, add ยง205-a, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the rights of parties involved in foreclosure actions
